code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{user:null},reducers:{login:function login(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logout:function logout(state){state.user=null;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,login=_userSlice$actions.login,logout=_userSlice$actions.logout;export{login,logout};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.user.user;};export default userSlice.reducer;
